# Receivables Guide

## Overview

Refactored module for receivables.

## Structure

Similar to payables: repositories, domain, use-cases, service, controller, dto.

## Key Use Cases

- Manage receivable transactions with installments.

## Patterns

- Symmetric to payables.</content>
